title: Define and persist the canonical integration event model

five_acts.act_1_context: Readiness decisions lacked durable, auditable event evidence and drifted from canonical contract fields.
five_acts.act_2_build: Implemented canonical integration event models, append-only idempotent storage, and readiness projection with supersession rules.
five_acts.act_3_conflict: Review surfaced nine Important issues spanning tie-breaking, replay semantics, validation attribution, duplication, typing, and missing coverage.
five_acts.act_4_resolution: All nine findings were fixed with targeted code changes and regression tests, then re-reviewed to APPROVE with no Important/Critical findings.
five_acts.act_5_outcome: Mainline now has durable event ingestion and deterministic readiness computation for integration candidates, plus demo artifacts for presentation.
